description: head and shoulders portrait of a woman wearing hat with veil which covers face and chin; fur neckpiece over jacket; pin on blouse
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on verso, in center, in black: [207]; on verso, in center, in blue: [865]; on verso, in center, in pencil: illegible inscription; along bottom edge, in pencil: [W.G. DJR-C:002]
signed: on verso, in center, in pencil: [I-\"MRS. RUZICKA\"/ by / LOUIS FLECKENSTEIN / 730 S. GRAND / LOS ANGELES, CALIF.]
title: Mrs. D.J. Ruzicka
